abstract: Flood of vitriolic commentary has cascaded onto Facebook since Hillary Rodham Clinton's announcement of her entry into the 2016 presidential race; so many users are choosing to 'unfollow' the heated discussion that a kind of polarization more often associated with MSNBC or Fox News is taking place, limiting dialogue to like-minded opinions.
lead_paragraph: Many users are whittling adverse viewpoints, resulting in the kind of polarization experience more often associated with MSNBC or Fox News.

headline.main: Casting Early Presidential Vote Through Facebook by Clicking ‘Unfollow’
headline.print_headline: Casting Early Presidential Vote Through Unfollowing

snippet: Many users are whittling adverse viewpoints, resulting in the kind of polarization experience more often associated with MSNBC or Fox News.
